com.splunk.logging

Class SplunkInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.splunk.logging.SplunkInput
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SplunkHECInput, SplunkRawTCPInput, SplunkRestInput

    public abstract class SplunkInput
extends java.lang.Object
    Common base class for all Splunk Input types. Currently just has shared logic for queuing up events.
    Author:
    Damien Dallimore damien@dtdsoftware.com

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxQueueSize

        public void setMaxQueueSize(java.lang.String rawProperty)
        Set the queue size from the configured property String value. If parsing fails , the default of 500KB will be used.
        Parameters:
        rawProperty - in format [|[KB|MB|GB]]
